title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Science Competency Short Course: Motivation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners will complete at least 80% of mobile-delivered microlearning content in the sciences within one week
Learners will improve collaborative problem-solving skills with peers by at least 70% through chat-based study groups
Learners will enhance learning plan establishment and execution rates by at least 60% using motivational scaffolding (including office hours)
Learners can submit practical problem-solving case studies in the sciences through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
